sentences.sContent: ...The employee with a headache does less work...
...States lay down rules about how many children each employee is allowed to watch over...
...an employee at Danny's Cycles in Gramercy also said Citi Bike is a good option for people to ease into biking in a city famed for its traffic jams and aggressive drivers...
...One of my most embarrassing moments was when I had a Chinese-American employee put in a request to take time off to celebrate Chinese New Year...

phrases.pCn: （美国国内税务署批准的）职工股票所有权计划
员工向导；雇员上岗引导

words.tran: 适宜雇用的；有资格任职的
可雇用者；符合最低雇用要求者
使用，采用；雇用；使忙于，使从事于

trans.tranCn: 受雇者， 雇员， 雇工
trans.tranOther: someone who is paid to work for someone else
